author: markt
msg: Allow the ErrorReportValve to write a response body if sendError() is
called during an async request if it is being handled on a container
thread. As per SRV 10.9.2, if an error occurs during an async request on
an application thread, writing the response body - if any - is entirely

author: hdu
msg: Dictionaries are installed as extensions now

author: robbie
msg: QPID-3881: Ensure we only put 0-8/0-9/0-9-1 messages in the store if they are actually routable. Remove some unused and test-only methods.
